actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Hatch without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 678.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution to refer H.R. 998 entitled "A bill for the relief of Lloyd B. Gamble" to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers H.R. 998 (a bill for the relief of a named individual) to the chief judge of the U.S. Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon. Limits the amount of damages to be awarded to the individual if judgment is entered in the individual's favor.

titles.title: A resolution to refer H.R. 998 entitled "A bill for the relief of Lloyd B. Gamble" to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.
